knimeNode.name: Reference Column Splitter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Reference Column Splitter allows columns to be split from the first table using the second table as reference.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows columns to be split from the first table using the second table as reference table.
fullDescription.option: Ensures that the matching columns don't only have the same name but also the same type. Columns are only included or excluded if the column type of the first table is a super-type of the column type from the second table. If not selected, only the column names need to match.

ports.inPort: Table from which columns are to be split
Table with the columns used as references
